turn_screen_right.description: Turn the display screen to the right side.

turn_screen_left.description: Turn the display screen to the left side.

spin_screen_cw.description: Spin the display screen in a clockwise direction.

spin_screen_ccw.description: Spin the display screen in a counter-clockwise direction.

rotate_screen_right.description: Rotate the display screen to right.

rotate_screen_left.description: Rotate the display screen to left.

rotate_screen_cw.description: Rotate the display screen in clockwise direction.

rotate_screen_ccw.description: Rotate the display screen in counter-clockwise direction.

adjust_screen_position.description: Adjust the position of the rotation screen.

wipe_display_base_clean.description: Wipe clean the display base to remove dust or any other particles.

dust_off_display_base.description: Dust off the display base to ensure it is clean.

rub_clean_display_base.description: Rub clean the display base to ensure it is devoid of any dust particles.

brief_clean_display_base.description: Give the display base a brief clean to remove any light dust particles.

clean_base_complete.description: Give the display base a thorough cleaning to free it from dust and debris.

wipe_display_base.description: Give the display base a quick wipe to get rid of dust or dirt particles.

clean_base.description: Clean the display base to keep it free from dust and debris.

clean_display_base.description: Clean the display base to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_bucket_base.description: Clean the display base to keep it sparkling and free from dust or any other particles.

clean_entire_display_quickly.description: Quickly clean the entire display unit, which includes both the base and the screen.

rotate_clean_display_unit.description: First, rotate the display screen to a preferred viewing angle. Afterwards, proceed to clean the whole unit.

dust_off_display.description: Dust off all parts of the display unit which includes both the display base and screen.

change_and_clean_display.description: Change the direction of the display screen, then clean the whole display.

full_clean_display_unit.description: Perform a full clean of the whole display unit which includes the base and screen.

rotate_and_wipe_display.description: First, rotate the display screen. After that, clean the whole unit.

clean_all_units_display.description: Clean the entire display including the display base and the screen.

rotate_screen_and_clean_display.description: Rotate the screen to a desired angle, then clean the whole display.

clean_all_display.description: Give the entire display unit a thorough cleaning, this includes the base and the screen.

adjust_clean_display.description: First, adjust the direction of the display screen. Afterwards, proceed to give the whole unit a cleaning.

wipe_display.description: Wipe clean all parts of the display unit including the display base and screen.

rotate_wipe_display.description: Rotate the screen to a new position, then proceed to wipe clean the whole display.

clean_entire_display.description: Thoroughly clean the whole display unit including the base and screen.

adjust_and_clean_display.description: Adjust the direction of the display screen, then clean the whole unit.

clean_display.description: Clean the entire display including the display base and the screen.

adjust_display.description: Rotate the screen and then clean the whole display.

rotate_screen_and_clean_base.description: Rotate the screen to desired position and clean the base of display.

clean_and_adjust_display.description: Clean the entire display including the screen and base, then rotate the screen to desired position.

adjust_and_wipe_display.description: Rotate the screen to achieve optimum view angle and clean the entire display including the base and the screen.

clean_display_unit.description: Clean the entire display including both the screen and base ensuring it's free from dust and debris.
